headline: Judah Spinner's BlackBird Financial Takes Large Stake in PayPal
summary: Spinner believes the company’s shares are meaningfully undervalued.Newark, New Jersey, Dec. 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- BlackBird Financial LP, a value-focused hedge fund founded by Judah Spinner, today announced that it has accumulated a significant ownership position in PayPal Holdings, Inc., the global payments platform serving more than 400 million consumer and merchant accounts and processing roughly $1.7 trillion in annual payment volume. headline: PayPal: Writing It Off Could Be A Grave Mistake (Rating Upgrade)
summary: I double upgrade PayPal to a buy, citing overlooked long-term growth initiatives and a deeply discounted forward P/E near 11.5. Click here to read my analysis.

raw.headline: PayPal: Writing It Off Could Be A Grave Mistake (Rating Upgrade)
raw.summary: I double upgrade PayPal to a buy, citing overlooked long-term growth initiatives and a deeply discounted forward P/E near 11.5. Click here to read my analysis.

headline: VQ Capital Launches an AI-Driven Platform Engineered for the Next Generation of Investments
summary: VQ Capital launched today as a thesis-driven, AI-native investment platform designed to scale companies into category leaders. The firm focuses on two foundational theses: the AI Transformation of Consumer Companies and the "Golden Dome" for Cyber Intelligence.

headline: Payments players cozy up to crypto
summary: Banks, card networks and fintechs are issuing stablecoins, and embracing the digital currency infrastructure to usher clients into a new financial era.

headline: Verizon CEO reveals mistakes that led to over 13,000 layoffs
summary: In recent weeks, Verizon has been turning heads with drastic changes that signal the company is heading in a new direction amid recent struggles. The phone carrier first raised eyebrows when it replaced then-CEO Hans Vestberg on Oct. 6 with Dan Schulman, the former CEO of PayPal. The shakeup ...
